Title: Buying These Dirt-Cheap Stocks Could Be a Brilliant Move
Summary: The article discusses three undervalued stocks that could be great investments: Altimmune, Moderna, and Pfizer. Altimmune is a high-risk, high-potential-reward play on its weight loss drug candidate. Moderna's stock has fallen significantly, but the company's mRNA platform and pipeline hold promise. Pfizer's low valuation and strong growth prospects make it an attractive option.
